Hacker News updated profiles

Source: R/api.R
get_updates.Rd

Retrieves changed item ids and changed profile usernames using Hacker News API

Usage

get_updates()

Value

list of changed item ids and list of changed profile usernames

Examples

# \donttest{
# get ids/usernames of updated items/profiles
hn_updates <- get_updates()
hn_updates
#> $items
#>  [1] 43615024 43615149 43614059 43611074 43615136 43613460 43615150 43610736
#>  [9] 43612631 43615151 43615012 43615069 43609118 43615018 43613691 43609820
#> [17] 43614359 43614416 43611944 43610923 43506763 43610717 43615049 43612913
#> [25] 43615040 43612986 43609496 43614928 43615153 43613970 43562054 43615154
#> [33] 43614788 43613434 43615037 43609635 43615098 43614593 43611759 43613199

#> [65] 43606315 43547609 43600582 43558464 43610760 43612765 43595269 43614505
#> [73] 43603646
